tool_description: Complete and up-to-date database with detailed information about IATA airports, IATA airlines, countries, alliances and more.
name: Travel Hacking Tool
title: Travel Hacking Tool

api_list.name: Get Airline Alliance List
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of airline alliances.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com/api/alliances/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com/api/alliances/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Airline Details
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the details for an airline based on an IATA code.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Specify the IATA code of an airline

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com/api/airlines/LH/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com/api/airlines/{code}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-hacking-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Airport Details
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the details such as name and location for a specified IATA airport.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Specify a valid three letter IATA code.

api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
